name: Validate content for global headers and footers in pdp page

steps.name: Given guest user is on michaels home page
When the user is on the "pdp" page
Then the Shop Categories header links are not broken
And the user clicks on the global header and validates its corresponding content for michaels
And the user clicks on the global footer and validates its corresponding content for 'pdp'
